scripts.build:dist: rm -rf ./dist && npm run build:lib && npm-run-all -p build:dist:*
scripts.deploy: npm run build && host=dev.wikipathways.org && rsync dist/pvjs.js $host:/var/www/$host/wpi/js/pvjs/
scripts.expected: echo 'Setting expected values for tests' && npm-run-all expected:* && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.expected:gpml: echo "Converting JSON (from GPML test files) to SVG and generating checksums:"; source_dirname=./node_modules/gpml2pvjson/test/expected; for source_file in $source_dirname/*.json; do output_file=`echo $source_file | sed s#$source_dirname#test/expected# | sed 's/\.json//'`".svg"; echo "$source_file -> $output_file"; cat "$source_file" | bin/pvjs json2svg -s false | tee "$output_file" | shasum -p -a 1 > "$output_file.sha1sum"; done && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run test && npm run expected
scripts.test: echo 'get in-browser tests working' && npm run test:checksums
scripts.test:checksums: for f in ./test/inputs/*.json; do base_path=`echo "$f" | sed s/.json//`; echo "Verifying checksum for $base_path.svg..."; cat "$f" | bin/pvjs json2svg -s false | shasum -p -a 1 -c "$base_path.svg.sha1sum"; done && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:lib && npm-run-all -p watch:*
scripts.watch:lib:assets: npm run build:lib:assets && onchange 'src/**' -- npm run build:lib:assets
